column4: Race/Ethnicity Data? (0 = No; 1 = Yes, But no Hispanic/Latino category; 2 = Yes, with Hispanic/Latino category)
column6: If H/L category, Separate Or combined? (0 = Race and Ethnicity combined, eg Black, white, or Hispanic; 1 = Race and Ethnicity Separate, eg Black or white, and Hispanic or non-Hispanic; 2 = Race/Ethnicity Crossed eg Non-Hispanic Black, Hispanic Black)
column7: Combined Rating (0 = No Race/Eth data; 1 = Data, but no Hisp/Lat category; 2 = Race and Ethnicity combined; 3 = Race and Eth separate; 4 = Race and Eth cross-tabbed
column8: Description of Data Available (What categories do they report under race? Under ethnicity? Are they together or separate?)
column9: Frequency of reporting? (0=not regularly reported, 1=annual or monthly prior to 2014; 2=annual or monthly 2014 or later)

column1: Number in Prison by Crime Type
